title: You can file a counter-notice in the event of a DCMA

tosdr.tldr:
If [reddit removes] your user content in response to a copyright or trademark notice, we will notify you via redditâ€™s private messaging system and offer to provide you with a copy of the notice. If you believe your user content was wrongly removed due to a mistake or misidentification of the material, you can file a counter-notice with [reddit] that includes some required information.

Upon receiving a counter-notice [reddit] will forward it to the complaining party and tell them we will restore your content within 10 business days.
